W18_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_TITLE.text: Capitol City: Seat of the Union

W18_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: After walking through the door, you find yourself in a city. The vast number of people leads to a lot of informational noise, but that only increases the chances you'll find a lead on your heart.

W18_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You weren't able to find your heart in Capitol City, and now find yourself wishing you had one as beautiful as Lita's.
